name: Elixer collector vessel - free 3D asset
description:
Few days back I realized Supercell's Clash of clans does not have an elixir collector vessel. So I made one.

Powered by three cloud engines; main engine for thrust & two side engines for maneuvering. Lift generated from the massive steam balloon.
Side mounted four Elixir barrels brew magic potions while flying. This vessel is a good choice for your goblin gatherers.

Buy now or never - only from the BUKKBEEK factory.

Visit BUKKBEEK by WildNation at

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bukkbeek

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bukkbeek
